name: vmware-pscoe
description: > A [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/) extension that provides code intelligence features and enables a more > developer-friendly experience when creating [vRealize Orchestrator](https://www.vmware.com/products/vrealize-orchestrator.html) > and [vRealize Automation](https://www.vmware.com/products/vrealize-automation.html) content.
